name: TrailTransclude
description: Alternative to Page, transclude the Chapters of another Trail (whose id must be listed in Trail.dependencies)

fields.name: id
fields.description: ID of trail from which pulling content. Must be defined also in Trail.dependencies

fields.name: chapters
fields.description: Can take one of three forms: 'all' to transclude all chapter, '#' to transclude a single chapter, or '#-#' to give a start and end chapter to transclude
